    • Method Detail

      • selectChannels

        public int[] selectChannels(SerializationDelegate<StreamRecord<T>> record,
                   int numberOfOutputChannels)
        Description copied from interface: ChannelSelector
        Called to determine to which attached OutputChannel objects the given record shall be forwarded.
        Specified by:
        selectChannels in interface ChannelSelector<SerializationDelegate<StreamRecord<T>>>
        Parameters:
        record - the record to the determine the output channels for
        numberOfOutputChannels - the total number of output channels which are attached to respective output gate
        Returns:
        a (possibly empty) array of integer numbers which indicate the indices of the output channels through which the record shall be forwarded
